Params[3]: All units ready. Starting countdown.
All units synchronized.
Gentlemen, time to go.
I'll leave my back to you then, sir.
Ha, don't fall asleep later.
Synchronization over. Heading out in 7 minutes...
What happened?!!
Incoming assault!!! Alert!!
The launch site has been breached! HQ, we need an order!
Is it an enemy attack?! But our alarm system didn't detect anything!!!
Warning. An influx of Corrupted in the battle preparation area. Communication with the first gate has been cut off.
Defense facilities activated. Closing all gates. All units, stay in position and organize defense.
We're still continuing with the operation?!
There's no life response. It's a Corrupted attack!
Stupid rookies! Who cares if they're human or not, they're already at our gates!
C-Captain Cyril! (Thankful)
They are heading toward the supply shuttle! What should we do?!
HQ, force shut down the auto-defense system.
Hmph, looks like President has other thoughts.
Initiate shuttle launch procedure. All combat personnel, eliminate all obstacles near the launch site. Help "Dagger" take off!
Kid, you hear that?
Of course. Don't push yourself too hard, old man. This is gonna be a tough brawl.
Hmph, you weren't even born when I served in the frontline!
You got me with that... Haha, I look forward to your performance!
Just you wait!
